actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

actions.subcommittee: Arms Control, International Security and Science
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Arms Control, International Security and Science

official_title: A bill to encourage international training in maritime skills.

summary.text: Amends the Foreign Assistance Act of 1961 to encourage the President to allocate some of the international military education and training funds for training in maritime skills provided by the Coast Guard. Excludes such training from the general prohibition against using such funds to provide police training.

titles.title: A bill to encourage international training in maritime skills.
